title.narrative: Increased Access to safe water and improved sanita

description.narrative: The project is aimed at improving access to safe and potable water, improved sanitation and good hygiene to people living in the small towns of Kasungu and Mponela in Malawi. The project which will be implemented for four years beginning April 2016, will reach out to approximately 5,950 people with access to safer water, 38,650 people with access to improved hygiene and 23,190 with access to good hygiene. The total budget for this project is GBP 1,776,338.

participating-org.narrative: Mineral & Appropriate Technology Applicable in Mal
